name: The Invasion (itch) (Aditya, Selfish Gamer, siderorb)
description:
The Invasion - Mini Jam 91 Description:

In this game you play as a warrior who fights monsters to earn a living. Your goal is to eradicate the invasion on earth fighting monsters and aliens.

Credit:

Main Concept and Artwork by Selfish Gamer

Programming done by Aditya

 Background Music by alberteinstien 

SFX by siderorb and non copy right sound from free sound.org (EverHeat, Julien Matthey and nknverpacker).

How to play:

You can move around with the 'WASD' keys and shoot arrow's with your bow and arrow  by clicking the mouse button. How ever these battle's will not be easy. To recover your health you can catch fish by shooting arrows at them and eat them by pressing 'E' on the keyboard
